job_tasks.phrase: GenAI, task management, digital onboarding and training
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI' directly indicates work with generative models, which falls under the modeling category. While task management and onboarding are not exclusively AI, they are listed as future features alongside GenAI, implying potential AI integration.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for all the back-end services of Albert Heijn's employee app
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly defines the responsibility for developing and maintaining the backend infrastructure of a user-facing application.

job_tasks.phrase: own the realization of new features
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of feature realization is a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: develop new features using the latest technology
job_tasks.justification: Developing new features with modern technologies is a direct indication of software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: develop code
job_tasks.justification: Writing code is the fundamental activity of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: enforce code quality
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring code quality is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: develop best practices
job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing best practices is a key part of software development lifecycle management.

job_tasks.phrase: write tests
job_tasks.justification: Writing tests is an integral part of the software development process for ensuring quality and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: manage the continuous integration of code
job_tasks.justification: Managing CI is a software development practice related to integrating code changes.

job_tasks.phrase: support product or platform architects
job_tasks.justification: Supporting architects in technical aspects is a software development related task.

job_tasks.phrase: technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech
job_tasks.justification: Acting as a technical liaison for business stakeholders is a software development role.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives
job_tasks.justification: Community contributions and inner source initiatives relate to broader software engineering practices and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers in developing a feature-rich product
job_tasks.justification: Leading development teams and guiding other developers is a senior software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to technically scale the services
job_tasks.justification: Technical scaling of services is a core software engineering concern for performance and capacity.

job_tasks.phrase: combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture
job_tasks.justification: Combining agile practices with microservices architecture is a key aspect of modern software development.

job_tasks.phrase: expert on 'your' domain(Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), though you can also liaise with other senior engineers and their respective technologies (Front and BackEnd)
job_tasks.justification: Being an expert in backend services and liaising with other technologies directly relates to software development specialization and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Everything we build in the app is scalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CD pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software architecture and deployment practices used, all of which fall under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: work in small increments so we're able to put things live straight away, hence reduce our time to market.
job_tasks.justification: Working in small increments and rapid deployment are agile software development methodologies.

job_tasks.phrase: impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app
job_tasks.justification: Having an impact on technical direction signifies involvement in software design and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: share knowledge and best practices with other teams.
job_tasks.justification: Sharing knowledge and best practices is a characteristic of senior roles in software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: manage the continuous integration of code
job_tasks.justification: Continuous Integration (CI) is a core component of MLOps and DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CD pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platform management (Azure) are all key aspects of MLOps and operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: own the realization of new features
push the engineering skills of the team
technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech
contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives
Understand how to technically scale the services
combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture
impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app
share knowledge and best practices with other teams

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions 'GenAI' as a future feature, indicating a focus on generative models. While heavily weighted towards Software Development and Operations Engineering (MLOps) with mentions of Kotlin, Azure, Kubernetes, and CI/CD, the inclusion of GenAI alongside these foundational tasks points towards a role that builds applications utilizing this technology. It lacks the deep ML modeling focus of an ML Engineer.
